data.title: Economist global headlines: Apple earns 2.4 billion yuan a day, Lei Jun responded to the resignation of Xiaomi Electronics Company chairman, the National Space Administration said it will cultivate th
meta_keywords: Economist global headlines: Apple earns 2.4 billion yuan a day
Lei Jun responded to the resignation of Xiaomi Electronics Company chairman
the National Space Administration said it will cultivate the development of space tourism
data.text:
Earn 2.4 billion a day! Apple released a strong financial report, with a single quarter revenue of nearly 800 billion yuan

On January 28, Beijing time, Apple announced the company's financial report for the first quarter of fiscal 2022 (October to December 2021). According to the financial report, Apple's quarterly revenue increased by 11% year-on-year to US$123.95 billion (equivalent to 789 billion yuan), the highest single-quarter revenue in history, with the market expected to be US$118.663 billion; earnings per share increased by 25% year-on-year to US$2.1, the market expected US$1.88; and net profit was US$34.63 billion (equivalent to 220.437 billion yuan, equivalent to nearly 2.4 billion yuan per day net income in a quarterly 92 days). In addition, Apple sees a lot of potential in the AR (virtual reality) space. When Cook was asked about the metacosm, he said: "New technologies are being explored. ‚Äù

Lei Jun responded to the resignation of Chairman of Xiaomi Electronics

Recently, Beijing Xiaomi Electronic Products Co., Ltd. underwent industrial and commercial changes, and Lei Jun stepped down as chairman. Wang Hua, general manager of the public relations department of Xiaomi Group, responded that it was a normal change. He said that Lei Jun's energy is mainly focused on car-related matters, and executives can already share some of the related work and responsibilities. Lei Jun responded on Weibo: There are many subsidiaries under the Mi Group, and the adjustment of the board of directors and legal representatives of the subsidiaries is very normal, and everyone need not misunderstand.

The China National Space Administration said it would nurture the development of space tourism

On January 28, the State Council New Office held a press conference. At the press conference, the China National Space Administration released the fifth space white paper - "China's Aerospace in 2021". At the same time, the China National Space Administration introduced that in the next five years, it will cultivate and expand the space application industry and support the high-quality development of economy and society. Promote the deep integration of space applications and digital economy, enrich application scenarios, and innovate business models. Facing the development of the industry and the region and the diversified needs of the public, we will deepen the comprehensive application of communication, navigation and remote sensing information. Accelerate the transfer and transformation of aerospace technology achievements to the economy and society, and cultivate and develop new space economy formats such as space tourism, space biopharmaceuticals, space debris removal, and space testing.

White Paper: In the next five years, China will fully build and operate the Chinese space station

The "2021 China Aerospace" white paper released by the Information Office of the State Council on January 28 pointed out that in the next five years, China will continue to implement manned spaceflight projects, launch the "Qingtian" experimental module, the "Dream" experimental module, the "Sky Survey" space telescope, as well as the "Shenzhou" manned spacecraft and the "Tianzhou" cargo spacecraft, fully build and operate the Chinese space station, build a national space laboratory, and carry out long-term astronaut stays, large-scale space science experiments, space station platform maintenance and other work.

Fliggy: The scope of services for buying and sending nucleic acid coupons to air tickets has been expanded, covering nearly 2,000 routes of 40 airlines

Today, Fliggy announced that on the basis of the previous launch of the purchase of tickets and nucleic acid test coupons, for the Spring Festival return booking peak hours and popular routes, to further expand the coverage of the service, including Air China, Hainan Airlines, Xiamen Airlines, Capital Airlines, Kunming Airlines, Changlong Airlines and other more than 20 airlines to join the action, Hangzhou Xiaoshan Airport, Zhuhai Jinwan Airport, Haikou Meilan Airport and other joint launch offline scanning code to send nucleic acid testing vouchers services. According to reports, as of now, Fliggy's action has covered nearly 2,000 routes in 40 airlines, and the scope of application continues to expand.

Weibo plans to launch a one-click isolation network violence model

On January 27, the community announcement was issued: In order to further implement the special action requirements of the Central Cyberspace Administration of China "Qinglang ‚Ä¢ 2022 Spring Festival Network Environment Improvement" and respond to the concerns of netizens about online violence, Weibo immediately set up a special working group to control online violence and conducted a centralized investigation of relevant content. Follow-up sites will strengthen the governance of online violence and unfriendly speech, continuously improve product function upgrades, plan to launch a "one-click isolation of network violence" model, strengthen the identification and handling of personal attacks/unfriendly remarks, optimize the protection of news parties, and ensure user safety.

Tencent established The North Interactive Entertainment Company in Dalian with a registered capital of 15 million yuan

On January 27, Dalian Beijing Interactive Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd. was established with a registered capital of 15 million yuan, legal representative Xu Guang, and its business scope includes artificial intelligence basic software development, network and information security software development, enterprise management consulting, information consulting services, etc. Shareholder information shows that the company is wholly owned by Shenzhen Tencent Tianyou Technology Co., Ltd.

iQIYI officially released the "iQIYI" App adapted to the car side

Recently, iQIYI officially released the "iQIYI" App suitable for the car side, and announced that it has reached a cooperation with FAW-Volkswagen and launched a download service in the FAW-Volkswagen pure electric vehicle ID. family car machine application store from January 28.

Liaoning Fangda Group issued nearly 500 million red envelopes

Recently, Liaoning Fangda Group sent three consecutive messages: three waves of large red envelopes were issued to employees, and bundles of 100 yuan bills were built into a cash wall! Among them, including HNA, which has just taken over the market for more than a month. On January 27, Fangda Jiujiang Iron and Steel built a cash wall at the scene and distributed 20,000 yuan of red envelopes and 2,000 yuan of "filial piety to parents" to each employee, with a total amount of 125 million yuan. On January 26, more than 60,000 employees of HNA Airlines received cash red envelopes of 5,000 yuan per capita, totaling more than 300 million yuan; on January 15, Fangda Dazhou Iron and Steel said that more than 5,700 employees distributed 10,000 yuan of Spring Festival red envelopes, totaling more than 57 million. In addition, according to incomplete statistics, Fangda Group issued a total of nearly 500 million red envelopes this year.

Saturday: The issuance of NFT digital assets is currently being discussed with partners

In response to the Shenzhen Stock Exchange's letter of concern before Saturday, the digital virtual person and digital asset library are digital copyright assets owned by the company or jointly owned by the company and the industry partnership, and the above-mentioned digital assets can be encrypted and identified in combination with the NFT technology in the blockchain field in the use of self-use and authorized third parties, which has the characteristics of uniqueness and identity. NFT technology can also be applied to the company's current cooperation with the star, tide play related IP, the company is currently discussing the issuance of NFT digital assets with partners in this field.

AutoX announced a total of more than 1,000 square kilometers of autonomous driving area

Chinese Robotaxi company AutoX announced that the autonomous driving area totals more than 1,000 square kilometers, making it the largest autonomous driving area in China. According to reports, AutoX is the first autonomous driving company in China to obtain a california DMV fully unmanned operation license, and it is also the first company in China to carry out fully unmanned driving tests on public roads in first-tier cities.

Chuandou fish is going to be privatized by Tencent, and people close to Tencent say the news is untrue

According to media reports, Tencent plans to work with at least one private equity investment institution to privatize Douyu. In this regard, Douyu and Tencent both said they would not comment. In addition, a person close to Tencent's internal said that he had confirmed with the internal team that the news was untrue and there was no such thing.

JD internal letter: JD.com issued 400 million yuan to subsidize front-line employees during the Spring Festival

On the morning of January 28, Jingdong Group issued an internal letter announcing that it would invest more than 400 million yuan to increase welfare subsidies for front-line employees who adhered to the Spring Festival. The internal letter reviewed JD.com's achievements and important nodes in the past year. The internal letter revealed that in the first half of last year, the average monthly salary and welfare expenditure of logistics for front-line employees exceeded 11,000 yuan. With the acceleration of the "Penfolds Plan" for rural revitalization, in October 2020, Jingdong proposed that it will drive the rural areas to achieve trillions of output values within three years, and by the end of 2021, it has achieved 320 billion yuan, which is expected to achieve the goal ahead of schedule.

Huang Xiaoming and Yang Ying divorced, and the two had no direct business relationship

On January 28, Huang Xiaoming and Angelababy posted on Weibo and officially announced their divorce. Huang Xiaoming has 48 affiliated companies, of which 32 exist, including Beijing Mingjia Investment Management Co., Ltd., Beijing Yiqian Film and Television Culture Studio, etc., involving film and television, catering, science and technology, investment and other fields. Among all the surviving enterprises, Huang Xiaoming serves as the legal representative of 5 companies, the shareholder of 31 companies, and serves as an executive in 3 companies. Huang Xiaoming also invested in two star film and television companies, LeTV Pictures (Beijing) Co., Ltd. and Bona Film Group Co., Ltd. In addition, Yang Ying has a total of 3 affiliated enterprises. From the perspective of the two-person related enterprises, Huang Xiaoming and Yang Ying have no direct business relationship.

Sweden will build the world's first nuclear waste repository

On January 27, local time, Annika Strandh√§ll, Sweden's minister of climate and environment, proposed at a government meeting to establish a nuclear waste repository. The Government of Sweden has confirmed its consent. This means that Sweden could become one of the first countries in the world to develop a highly active nuclear waste storage method and location.

U.S. GDP growth of 5.7% in 2021

The first estimate released by the US Department of Commerce on the 27th showed that the real GDP of the United States in the fourth quarter of 2021 increased by 6.9% per annum; the US economic growth in 2021 was 5.7%, the highest value since 1984.

Google is investing $700 million in India's second-largest mobile phone operator

Barty Telecom, India's second-largest mobile phone operator, reportedly announced that Google will make a $700 million equity investment in Barty Telecom at a price of 734 rupees ($9.8) per share to acquire its 1.28% ownership. In addition, Google will invest $300 million in a multi-year agreement with Barty Telecom. This will advance Google's development in the world's second largest wireless market.

Meta's acquisition of Customer Relationship Management company Kustomer was conditionally approved by the European Union

Meta's acquisition of U.S. customer relationship management firm Kustomer was reportedly approved by the EU antitrust authority on the condition that Meta make some compromises that allow competitors to continue to use the acquired company's communication channel features for free for the next decade. Kustomer primarily sells customer relationship management software to enterprises.

SoftBank Group Chief Operating Officer Marcelo Claure will depart

The interface quoted Bloomberg news on January 28, SoftBank founder Masayoshi Son said in a statement that Marcelo Claure, the chief operating officer (COO) of SoftBank Group who has been with the company for 9 years, will leave, and Michel Combes will become the CEO of SoftBank Group International.

The Sega brand withdrew from the arcade history stage

GENDA Sega Entertainment today announced that with the repurchase of 14.9% of the company's shares, the company name will be changed to GENDA GiGO Entertainment, and the name of the arcade shop operated under the Sega brand in Japan will also be changed to "GiGO", which means that the Sega Arcade will completely withdraw from the historical stage.

Tesla's market value evaporated by hundreds of billions of dollars on Thursday, and Musk lost $24.5 billion

January 28 news, although the U.S. electric car manufacturer Tesla released a record fourth quarter of 2021 earnings and future outlook, but failed to impress investors, causing the company's stock price to plummet, the market value in one day evaporated more than $100 billion. Meanwhile, Tesla CEO Elon Musk lost $24.5 billion in personal net worth. Still, Musk is still the richest man in the world, with a fortune of $218.3 billion.

Europe's first quantum computer with more than 5,000 qubits was launched in Germany

According to China-Singapore Finance, the reporter learned from the German Federal Foreign Trade and Investment Agency (GTAI) on the 28th that the German Forschungszentrum J√ºlich Center recently launched a quantum computer with more than 5,000 qubits. The center said that as the first quantum computer in Europe to have more than 5,000 qubits, this is a milestone in the development of quantum computers in Europe.

The SpaceX runaway rocket will collide with the moon, causing an explosion to leave artificial craters

According to the Guardian, after SpaceX launched a Falcon 9 rocket from Florida in February 2015 to send a space meteorological satellite to Lagrange Point, the secondary rocket weighing about 4 tons was abandoned in high orbit and became space junk. Space observers believe the rocket will intersect the moon at a speed of 2.58 km/s in a matter of weeks. According to the BBC, the collision is expected to occur on March 4, when the rocket will explode at the time of the collision, leaving a small artificial crater on the lunar surface.

SEMI Report: Global fab equipment spending is expected to hit a record high in 2022, marking three consecutive years of growth

Semi, in its quarterly World Fab Forecast, highlighted that global front-end fab equipment spending is expected to grow 10 percent year-over-year in 2022 to a record high of more than $98 billion, marking the third consecutive year of growth. After a 17% increase in 2020 and a 39% increase in 2021, fab equipment spending will continue to grow in 2022. The last three consecutive years of growth in the industry was between 2016 and 2018, and the last three consecutive years of growth was in the mid-1990s.

SK Hynix releases financial results for fiscal 2021 and the fourth quarter

January 28, 2022 ‚Äì SK Hynix (or the 'Company') today released its financial results for the fiscal year 2021 and fourth quarter ended December 31, 2021. In fiscal 2021, the company's combined revenue was 42.998 trillion won, operating profit was 12.410 trillion won, and net profit was 9.616 trillion won. For fiscal 2021, the operating margin was 29% and the net profit margin was 22%.

1. "Clean Capture" completed millions of yuan of financing, invested by Jianfeng Capital.

2. Recently, Hangzhou Orange Wish Cultural Planning Co., Ltd., the parent company of the first batch of offline high-end live-action scripts in China, announced the completion of tens of millions of yuan Pre-A round of financing, and the investor is NetEase Games.

3. Recently, Shunyun Technology, an enterprise focusing on the development of numerical simulation software for next-generation fluid multiphysics engineering, announced the completion of tens of millions of yuan A round of financing, led by Gusu Talent Fund.

4. Truck Tesco recently completed tens of millions of financing, and this round of financing is led by Guangxi Institute of Industry and Research Institute of Artificial Intelligence and Big Data Application Co., Ltd.

5. Blockchain infrastructure provider and crypto custodian Fireblocks recently announced a $550 million Series F round of funding, jointly led by Spark Capital and D1 Capital Partners.

6. Kinko Biotech recently completed a round of financing of nearly 200 million yuan, which was led by Shenzhen Investment Holding Capital, with the participation of SoftBank China Capital, Shengyu Investment, Youyin Medical Fund and other institutions.

1. On January 28, Tianqi Lithium submitted a listing application on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, and the co-sponsors were Morgan Stanley, CICC and CMB International.

2. Beijing Yihuatong Technology Co., Ltd. submitted the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, with Guotai Junan and Zhifu as its joint sponsors.

3. The IPO review status of Yunhanxincheng CHINext has been changed to "Inquired".

4. On January 26, 18 companies, including Fantuo Digital, Bama Tea, Yuandao Communications, Keyuan Pharmaceutical, Dianqi Shares, Zhuo Chuang Information, Zhongyi Technology, Junyi Digital, Guangkang Biochemical, Yihong Shares, Maxima, Zhongzhi Technology, Guangdong Kemao, Xinyuan Shares, Kgger Seiki, Jintongren, Renxin New Material, Hainuoer, etc., applied for the IPO review status of the ChiNext Board to "suspension".

1, A shares today ushered in the end of the year of the bull, the three major index trends differentiated, the final closing up and down, of which the Shanghai index fell 0.97%, closed at 3361.44 points, the Shenzhen Composite Index fell 0.53%, closed at 13328.06 points. The market turnover exceeds 800 billion yuan.

2. The Hang Seng Index oscillated at a low level in the afternoon, closing down 1.08% at 23550.08 points; the Hang Seng Technology Index closed down 1.71% at 5291.7 points; the science and technology network stocks fell, Hengwang concept stocks, Returning To Hong Kong Chinese stocks, Chinese securities companies fell lower, the power and pharmaceutical sectors fell; the education sector picked up, and China Education Holdings rose more than 43%.

3. European stocks fell wider, with germany's DAX falling 1%, France's CAC40 down 0.36%, and Europe's Stoxx 600 down 0.5%.

4. On January 28, domestic commodity futures closed up and down differently, the main iron ore contract rose more than 7%, pulp rose more than 5%, LPG rose more than 4%, ferrosilicon, manganese silicon, coke, soybean oil rose more than 3%, coke, thread, hot coil, glass, palm rose more than 2%, Shanghai aluminum, soybean meal, starch rose more than 1%. Thermal coal fell more than 6%, Shanghai silver and urea fell more than 3%, and crude oil and plastics fell more than 2%.

Scientists propose that atomic explosions release 200 million volts of energy

On January 28, 1939, Enrico Fermi of the University of Rome told a conference of theoretical physicists in Washington that atomic explosions could release 200 million volts of energy. Fermi said the enormous energy was emitted by German scientist Otto Hahn during an experiment when he bombarded an artificial synthetic element called quasi-uranium with neutrons. Physicists attending the conference said Otto-Hahn's achievements were no less than the discovery of radioactivity. But it will take at least 20 years to apply it in practice. They did not know that after 6 years, humans had created an "experimental object" to test the theory - the atomic bomb.
